rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: [i]When the Weft failed, the Root remained. The surviving users had to learn to live in a physical world again.[/i]
notes:
If common: Sanctified Root
